website_summaries.verdict: Its roomy interior, efficient design, and error-proof digital controls make this electric smoker a great model for novice smokers.
pros: Large latch provides a smoke-tight seal
cons: This electric smoker does not include a protective cover

customer_reviews.title: Worry free smoked meat done to perfection.
customer_reviews.text: This is a great, top notch smoker. I love smoking spiral sliced hams with this smoker. The removable racks give you a flexible environment for smoking large meats or several racks of ribs. The design is well thought and well manufactured. The digital interface is easy to understand and use. With the included thermometer, you set the smoke temp and the meat temp you want. Close the door and lock the latch and let the smoker do all the work worry free. I considered getting the glass door, but I am glad that I did not. I did not want to spend time cleaning glass when I should be eating delicious smoked meat.
customer_reviews.author: KahunaSchelf

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Smoker!
customer_reviews.text: Works flawlessly. A friend and I cooked identical pork butts side by side with his wood fired smoker. They turned out identical. The only difference was he had to fight his smoker all day while mine sat unattended. Very easy to use. Couldn't be happier.
customer_reviews.author: Christine

customer_reviews.title: Absolute Garbage
customer_reviews.text: I used it three times since I got it last May. Worked okay the first time, second time the temperature probe would not work no matter what I did. Second time it popped the GFI on the outlet when it was warming up. Tried to use it the third time and now it just pops the GFI without warming up. Avoid this unit.
customer_reviews.author: Willy

customer_reviews.title: Product works well and is easy to clean
customer_reviews.text: Product works well and is easy to clean. I would recommend cleaning the inside after each use. The temperature smoking function works well, probably better than expected. I didn't trust it at first since it had the meat done before the chart said it should be done (time). I left the meat in a bit longer and found it a bit overdone; should have trusted the temperature sensor.
customer_reviews.author: Wolfgang Greinke

customer_reviews.title: 5 half of pan fish fillets no skin on them and they came out great. Love that I do not have to coat ...
customer_reviews.text: Did 1.5 lbs. of pan fish fillets no skin on them and they came out great. Love that I do not have to coat or fry the fish or use tarter sauce they taste great right out of the smoker very happy. Main use will be for fish, turkey and chicken. I got plenty of smoke flavor in the fish only being in a little more than an hour so I am guessing birds will have alot of smoke flavor being in much longer. Will have to update after poultry have been done but things look good from here.
customer_reviews.author: C. Sheehy

customer_reviews.title: evidently needs a Much heavier Duty heating element
customer_reviews.text: only lasted about 12 uses, OK while it lasted !
customer_reviews.author: Cpt

customer_reviews.title: How easy it is to use and the price was what I wanted to pay!
customer_reviews.text: I needed a new smoker, and searched all brands. The Char-Broil had everything I was looking for, it is so easy to use and the food is beyond delicious! I bought the stand also, so no bending at my old age!
customer_reviews.author: Pam Fink

customer_reviews.title: Great Birthday Gift
customer_reviews.text: My son had one of these and loved it. He makes the best smoked wings. So I bought one for boyfriend for his birthday. Smoked chicken breasts on the bone are great also. It works well, has lots of space/racks and easy to clean and store.
customer_reviews.author: Bonnie Davis Mayhew

customer_reviews.title: Excellent electric smoker but paint blistered on 1st use.
customer_reviews.text: Used for the first time today (after reasoning 2 hrs. last night as instructed). Cooked an excellent brisket. Loved the digital temperature control and temperature probe. However when I went to clean up I found the paint peeling/blistering where the door meets the frame. Tried calling Char Broil and sat on hold for over 30 minutes but no one answered. I guess I’ll try again tomorrow.
customer_reviews.author: Kerry Paul Kirby

customer_reviews.title: Easy!!!!
customer_reviews.text: You don't get the intense smoke that you would from a conventional charcoal/wood smoker but this is the easiest smoking I have ever done! I love the set it and forget aspect of the meat thermometer. I don't feel like I have to commit my entire day to smoking something. Not that it doesn't need tending, just not nearly as much!
customer_reviews.author: Richard Mills

customer_reviews.title: Love it.
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product, at least for my needs. Does exactly what it says; stays at an even temperature, smokes well. I like that I don't have to deal with the wood in a manual smoker. I set the temperature, install my (purchased separately) Bluetooth thermometer, insert the smoker box, and then don't worry about it. Awesome.
customer_reviews.author: Mom of 3 boys

customer_reviews.title: it does a job but the smoke is much less ...
customer_reviews.text: Update: sporadically shows error or does not turn on... it does a job but the smoke is much less (wood chuck becomes charcoal and that it) than my previous smoker. I am going to try wood pellets.
customer_reviews.author: I. Shin

customer_reviews.title: Worth the price!!
customer_reviews.text: Best smoker I have ever owned, works flawlessly excellent results every time....Wish it was easier to clean, possibly they could use some non stick type of surfaces, if possible?
customer_reviews.author: Aaron Harris

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product. Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product. Easy to use. Liked mine so well sent one to my grandson. Brisket, ribs, lamb, chicken, sausage--all wonderful.
customer_reviews.author: Bill W

customer_reviews.title: Overall a good smoker
customer_reviews.text: Easy to operate, set and forget pretty much. Digital probe is nice and worked great. The only reason this didn't get 5 stars is that once heated up the grates/shelves do not slide in and out easily, it's like the insides swell up or something because when it's cold they have about 1/4 play and work great.
customer_reviews.author: Jami O.

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Smoked fish, burgers, ribs, brisket, ect, ect, smokes everything to perfection, we even use it in the winters of Colorado inside our garage
customer_reviews.author: Susan

customer_reviews.title: Great Smoker
customer_reviews.text: Put foil down on drip tray for easy cleanup. Worked great, but had to bump up the temperature when it was cold out which it should’ve done itself. It was about 20 degrees difference too. Bought used and it looked brand new.
customer_reviews.author: Jon

customer_reviews.title: Mine was defective right out of the box. It ...
customer_reviews.text: Mine was defective right out of the box. It turned on but wouldn't do anything else. The box was undamaged too. I ended up returning it for a refund.
customer_reviews.author: Wesley James

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: I'd been using mine for about a year and it works great. My only complaint is the digital thermometer stopped working. Not too big of deal because I have a professional instant read thermometer that I'd use to verify the temperature. Well worth the money and this unit has one of the largest wood boxes out there for hours of smoke.
customer_reviews.author: Amy Jordan

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This smoker works great, I am more than satisfied with it and recommend it to all avid smoker chefs
customer_reviews.author: Robert Galletti

customer_reviews.title: Best tasting smoked meat
customer_reviews.text: I have been getting many excellent reviews from the meat we smoked from friends & family! We use large aluminum trays to make for easy cleanup, that fit between the grills!Set it & walkaway and come back when done. Great,great product!
customer_reviews.author: Martha Gould

customer_reviews.title: Love this smoker
customer_reviews.text: Love this smoker. Smoked a 6 lb chicken inserted probe and 2 hrs later we ate it was great! We also made ribs and also delicious
customer_reviews.author: Ollen tangy

customer_reviews.title: Check everything before ups leaves!
customer_reviews.text: Seems to be fine other than appearing like they kicked it from Kentucky to California.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good product for the money.
customer_reviews.text: Takes a bit to produce smoke.. but once it takes off ... Works great.
customer_reviews.author: randy

customer_reviews.title: Ribs, Chicken, Sausage, Pork, Wings - you name it.
customer_reviews.text: Yum Yum, smoked meat. With prime and quick free shipping, you can beat the overall price. Works great!
customer_reviews.author: Georgean78

customer_reviews.title: Broken on arrival; inexpensive
customer_reviews.text: I got this really fast which was a plus, and i got it for 124.99 which was equally as awesome since its not 170. When it arrived though the wheel was broken off. I will update this when I cook with it!
customer_reviews.author: Michael J Morrison

customer_reviews.title: Set it and forget it.
customer_reviews.text: Great smoke flavor, easy to use. Set it and forget it. Picture of a smoked chicken made in the smoker.
customer_reviews.author: DJ

customer_reviews.title: Good smoker
customer_reviews.text: I love this smoker. It maintains a steady temperature for no fuss smoking.
customer_reviews.author: M. Funkhouser

customer_reviews.title: Not as advertised
customer_reviews.text: Poor control and display of cooking temperature. Difficult to use. Designed for small amount of smoke during cooking using its wood chip box with the lid on. When cooking with a temp probe, it does not display the internal cooking temperature like the instructions claim, I measured it with a separate cooking thermometer, it's way above the set temperature of 200F, too high to measure (>300F), meat turned out tough for a slow cooking smoker. Would return it for a refund if I can figure out how to ship it.
customer_reviews.author: FC

customer_reviews.title: Smokes like a train, easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Have now smoked 3 items on the smoker and am very pleased. Just plug it in and watch the temp on the lcd. Makes a lot of smoke
customer_reviews.author: Chris Teets

customer_reviews.title: Good product for the most part
customer_reviews.text: Good product for the most part. Some hardware for the smoker box were loose and bent, but the box did not make much smoke so I gutted it to use my own anyway.
customer_reviews.author: Caleb Gerweck

customer_reviews.title: SMOKING!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome Smoker! This is my second smoker and I like this one better than the Masterbilt I had. Fire and forget!! A++
customer_reviews.author: Jerry McClain

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very elegant, as to the operation I can not comment yet I did not use
customer_reviews.author: Edinatan J.

customer_reviews.title: How easy it is to use
customer_reviews.text: works great and great price and easy to use .smoked pork butt ,ribs,and chicken so far and all was great
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Works great. Very happy with the product. The large space makes it great for different types of meat.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Could not control the temp high enough to get any ...
customer_reviews.text: Could not control the temp high enough to get any smoke, it cooked the food with no smoke at all...sent it back
customer_reviews.author: Greg W.

customer_reviews.title: Easy to follow instructions and some cooking tips were included
customer_reviews.text: It arrived quickly and well-packaged. Easy to follow instructions and some cooking tips were included. Very happy!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: C'mon over for a great smoked dinner!
customer_reviews.text: I'm new to smoking but have always wanted to try it. This unit is easy to use, set up and clean. After a few mistakes this works fantastic. Great tasting meat and poultry. One thing, invest in a wireless remote temperature gauge. I went by suggested time and everything was dry, When I switched to internal temperature it made a world of difference.
customer_reviews.author: eric s. blum

customer_reviews.title: Love it - works great - easy to use.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my husband for Christmas - he loves it and it works great. He has used on ribs, salmon and brisket. It all tasted great. It is so easy to set the time and temperature.
customer_reviews.author: TrishD

customer_reviews.title: Probe trouble
customer_reviews.text: In meat probe mode, it will default to 120 degree cooking temp before meat has reached desired temp.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Definitely can't set it and forget it.
customer_reviews.text: Tried to use it twice, the temperature fluctuates wildly, and it turns itself off. Having to keep turning it on isn't just inconvenient, it ruins the quality of the meat. I see another review that says the same thing, and that customer service is not helpful. I'm returning it today.
customer_reviews.author: Laura Corey

customer_reviews.title: Faulty unit right out of the box.
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this unit because the quality seemed better than the Masterbuilt. Ordered the unit for a great price here on Amazon, unboxed and followed the instructions to "season" the unit. The unit did not power on. Spoke to a char-broil live agent, and they said the power board and cord need to be replaced and they would send me a new one. Although that's great, I don't feel like I should have to Fix something that is brand new that I just took out of the box, so Char-Broil, you get one star. What a shame because the quality of the box is very well put together.
customer_reviews.author: Adam C.

customer_reviews.title: that was great. No package/box damage and the unit itself arrived ...
customer_reviews.text: Quick delivery, that was great. No package/box damage and the unit itself arrived unharmed. However there are 2 screws that I found in the bottom of the box, but they don't seem to go anywhere, maybe extras? I plugged it in, and seasoned it and got the meat ready. I tried ribs today, and I could not get the unit to create any smoke, at all. Though the wood chips were pretty much ash after ~3 hours of cooking. So I tried soaking the woodchips, and got the same result, no smoke. Not sure what is going on, I will update this review later on.
customer_reviews.author: Zane Thomas

product_meta.title: Char-Broil 19202101 Deluxe Black Digital Electric Smoker, Large, 725 Square Inch
product_meta.description: Style:Deluxe Black Digital Electric SmokerAn exclusive, The Char-Broil digital electric black smoker deluxe is the perfect smoker for those who want to enjoy delicious smoked foods, but don't have the time to tend to a live Fire for hours on end. With it's user-friendly & intuitive digital display & integrated temperature probe, you simply program the unit to smoke your food to a desired internal Temperature, & then once there, the unit will keep your food warm until it is removed & ready to be served. Offers a whopping 725 sq. In. Of cooking space over four different cooking grates- more than enough space to cook for a party of 8 or more! Insulated double wall construction makes the Char-Broil electric smoker 10 times more efficient with the wood chips - meaning you can fill the box Once compared to 10 times with the leading electric smoker & still get the same amount of smoke. Features a large latched door with Glass window so that you can monitor progress without opening the door, as well as air dampers & an Advanced control panel with easy-read, blue LED display. The integrated temperature probe can be removed & cleaned when not in use, & a high-capacity grease tray located under the smoker easily slides out for grease removal & cleanup. & with the Char-Broil large capacity smoke box, you’ll get 4 to 7 hours of smoke before needing to refill, which means more time spent with friends, family & guests. Measures 18 1" W x 16 5" D x 32 5" H & weighs 50 2lbs.
feature_bullets: Advanced control panel with easy-read, blue LED display
Glass door allows you to monitor the smoke without opening the door
Large, steel locking latch for smoke-tight seal
Remote control not included, (Only with deluxe stainless steel model)

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.4 out of 5 stars157 ratings4.4 out of 5 stars
